db:abstract.db:para: This is a collection of XMLHttpRequest examples.

db:article.db:para: XMLHttpRequest contains a small QML example demonstrating Qt QML's XMLHttpRequest functionality. For more information, visit the section about XMLHttpRequest.

db:section.db:title: Running the Example
db:section.db:para: To run the example from Qt Creator, open the Welcome mode and select the example from Examples. For more information, visit Building and Running an Example.

db:section.db:title: Get Data
db:section.db:para: Get data uses the XMLHttpRequest API to fetch an XML document from a server. It displays the header of the HTTP response and the body of the XML document.
